website_summaries.verdict: The Sony MDR-1R is a powerful, clean-performing pair of headphones that's comfortable to wear and lends itself well to multiple genres of music.
pros: Solid audio performance with strong bass, crisp highs, and no distortion at top volumes
Comes with two detachable cables, one with inline microphone and remote control

customer_reviews.title: Sony hits a homerun!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my Sony MDR1RBT Bluetooth headphones today. Paired with my Sony Xperia Z3V.... Let me just say these are some pretty nice headphones. Super comfortable and sound great!!!!! I have read that after you burn them in a little they sound even better. I have read in some previous reviews they are not loud enough. Let me just say i totally disagree. They seem plenty loud. All around great sounding Bluetooth headphone. Crisp and clean with just the right amount of bass i believe . As far as receiving a phone call on them ......still need to try that feature. Although the reviews say calls sound great. Recommended Sony's for sure.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable you owe it to yourself to buy them
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the best headphones I have used in a long time. They are super comfortable and I cant stop thinking about them. The base is great the sound in general is wonderful. Seriously these are Beyerdynamic level comfort on these things. I use them about 6 hours a day at work and cant get enough.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, reputation for being super comfortable not accurate for me.
customer_reviews.text: These sound amazing, but I purchased them primarily for the general consensus that these are some of the most comfortable headphones around. I'd have to disagree with that assessment. I have a pretty big head, and although there are a lot of reviews saying that the MR1R's are comfortable for any head size, I found the clamping force to be unbearable after about 20-30 minutes of use. The sound is great. Overall build quality is a bit plasticky for my taste, but at the same time didn't feel overly cheap.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Nice head set
customer_reviews.text: These headphones for a great product at the time when I bought them, but over time the battery life on the headphones it got so much shorter to where the battery crapped out altogether I had replace headphones but overall it lasted me just too old for a year
customer_reviews.author: Steven thoen

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Really. They sound great, are comfortable, and the bluetooth works flawlessly. I'm wearing them more than I ever thought I would. I'm not much of a headphone wearer and it did take me a short time to get used to the feel of them, but once I did they are a joy to wear. The band that goes over my (bald) head is padded and really comfortable. I spent a lot (for me) on these and would do it again in a heartbeat. Their support for the better sounding apx codec was also important to me. Oh, and the battery life is incredible!
customer_reviews.author: jayvan

customer_reviews.title: HD598 and Bose IEM are very good also. They just represent different presentations
customer_reviews.text: This review is of the MDR R1. I listened to the MDR R1 through my Samsung Note2. Using MP3 RIPPED AT 196K. I also ran it through the Power Amp app using the Rock preset. The headphones have sparkling sound. There is seperation of the instruments.There is low end..There is the immediacy associated with being in the studio control room or close to the stage. These are special. I also use Sennheiser HD598 and Bose IEM. As soon as the MDR R1 arrived and I used them they became my most interesting pair. HD598 and Bose IEM are very good also. They just represent different presentations. Music selections were Yes..Beatles..Bocelli.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality - Prompt Delivery and Good Packaging by Seller ...
customer_reviews.text: Good Quality - Prompt Delivery and Good Packaging by Seller Sound Quality is good, but in Blue Tooth Mode...the volume is insufficient. I play drums with my headphones on and the volume maxes out far to early. I may return these, but I am working to make them work for me. With the cord, the phones are louder and you can download volume boosters which help. So, I haven't decided yet if I am going to keep or return them.
customer_reviews.author: Scot

customer_reviews.title: Finally a great sound headphones by my favorite brand.
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. Bluetooth works easy. Battery life is just enough. The directional drivers idea is awesome. Gives you an ear-bud sound experience without having something stuck in your ear canal. Controls are easy to find, understand and operate. Sound is clear and definitive. Highs are just wright, crisp and clear, with no distortions. Lows are still a little boosted, but it is correctable and does not mess up the whole sound picture. Overall this is a solid, well designed product. Wont regret the money I spent on it. It is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Light & Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones after quite a bit of research & trying different ones on in stores. I purchased these mainly to use with my home computer where I do paperwork & don't want to disturb anyone else. They are not noise cancelling, but this is something I did not require. The fit is very comfortable compared to any others I tried, especially being a women & wearing earrings. They cover my ear nicely without pressure. I found the sound quality to be excellent & they are very lightweight. I would highly recommend this model.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Berghmans

customer_reviews.title: Good Headphones, but Not Enough Room
customer_reviews.text: I really love these headphones. The leather is comfortable and the sound is amazing. They also look very stylish and I could wear them outside if I wanted to. But, the deal breaker on this is that if your ears stick out quite a bit and are large, the headphones don't have enough room, therefore your ears get a bit smushed. But when I wore them they were great, but after wearing for more than an hour, they would start to get uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Adam O. Glist

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sound. Perfect over the ear comfort
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful sound. Perfect over the ear comfort. Quality construction. Detachable cable. Even better than my Sony MDR-V600s, and that's saying a lot! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Charles J.

customer_reviews.title: OK PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting professional studio sound quality but at least what i paid for. I was expecting something louder, clear and bass strong worth the almost $200 I paid. That said, quality is good but not great. Do not expect boosting bass, neither something extremely loud, but something balanced and not 100% clear sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Eixiel Taboada

customer_reviews.title: Crisp Balance of Acoustics and Bass
customer_reviews.text: When I first heard these in the Sony Outlet Store, I was instantly hooked to their crisp and balanced acoustics. While most headphones can only reach a certain "high," these go above and beyond. Trumpets, for example, sound real--their unique sound pierces the sound barrier. Overall, very well done pair of headphones. Highly recommended. **As with any headphones, know that they take time to "get good." Play some dynamic music, and within a couple weeks, they'll mature. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Kipp

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I just got mine today and im just listening to my music on my phone. Pairing the headphones to my phone was easy just took 5 seconds. They have great sound quality and they don't leak any sound as my sister is seating across from me and doesn't hear anything until I turn the volume all the way up but thats ear drum busting and I like my ears for listening lol. And got a great deal as I got them refurbished but didn't come with the charger so ima contact the seller and see if that was suppose to come with the headphones if not i have an extra charger that can charge these. So far no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Javier Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Not good if you are listening to the radio----HOWEVER---my jazz cds ...
customer_reviews.text: These cans just arrived....am starting to test them. They are very comfortable----a bit on the bassy side. Not good if you are listening to the radio----HOWEVER---my jazz cds sound good on them. Overall, a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphones I've Ever Owned.
customer_reviews.text: My best friend bought these a while back and I really liked the way they fit, sounded, and looked. They don't hurt my ears at all like some other headphones I've had and they look really good on your head. They also have an amazin' sound that is on par or even better than Dre Beats. If you're lookin' for a nice soundin' headphone that looks nice and aren't insanely expensive, I would recommend these all day!
customer_reviews.author: Kinklord

customer_reviews.title: Headphones fully capable at producing all audible tones clearly. ...
customer_reviews.text: Headphones fully capable at producing all audible tones clearly. No active noise cancellation however am sitting in the rock on a Friday at prime time and I can't hear the drunk rAmble on to his dates dismay. Was worth is at 325. Less then 200 a no brainier. Battery lasts for freaking ever. Light weight won't fall off your head. I longboard with these on. I get goose bumps when I listen to these. 100% win.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin O. Thorsen

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, but the build quality isn't that great. I've had it about a year and the ear cup has broken off, the tabs on the headset itself broke off, so it's not like I can just replace the ear cup. :( Out of warranty too.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: best deal out there
customer_reviews.text: These headphones r fantastic,hell they go down to 4hz. 4hz are you kidding. In other words these suckers have base up the wazoo! I use them with my ipod and I put the equalization on treble boost and they deliver. For the price they r a bargin.
customer_reviews.author: James Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Headphones with clarity and comfort
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable headphones that I've ever worn - they are very well padded and extremely light weight. The are NOT "over the top" bassy - if you like that heavy punch bass these may not be for you. At the same time, they do have a good amount of bass while holding true to the clarity of the high and mid range - I am very happy with these headphones !!!
customer_reviews.author: SM2400

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: These weren't cheap headphones but they're worth every penny. Great sound quality. Good range. Very comfortable for long listening sessions. Outside noise can be heard but it's not too bad. If they were noise canceling that would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ernest leitch

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat these for the price. Great sound, good battery life, nice fitting. I use it with my Samsung Galaxy 10.1 tablet and can walk 45' outside of the house and still get great sound. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Jimdorn1

customer_reviews.title: Great job by Sony
customer_reviews.text: Let's get right to it: PROS 1. Extremely comfortable 2. Imageing is outstanding 3. Sound is light and airy. Vocals, especially female are excellent 4. They sound great with all types of music. CONS 1. Definitely not for bassheads
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Camino

customer_reviews.title: Look No Futher......Sony has done it.
customer_reviews.text: I brought it for inflight movies and music. Works excellent. Easy to interface with Bluetooth devices. The battery life is as reported, very long. It's nice to not be tethered to wires. I am using an Ipod. It states that you can only recharge these headphones with a computer or laptop. You can also charge it on a JBL " CHARGE " Bluetooth tube speaker. The sound comes through rich and clean. The bass response is pleasurable. I would suggest getting the case for it. That protects the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Lary B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Wireless Solution
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a pair Bluetooth headphones these are the pair to go with. They sound phenomenal, are very comfortable for long periods of use, and have tremendous battery life. I have owned a pair of Beats Studio Wireless,and the Bose AE2W but they both fall short to these headphones. The bass response is very detailed, but does not over shadow the minds,or highs and makes for a great listening experience. Sony really hit the nail on the head with these headphones!
customer_reviews.author: Trevar DiFalco

customer_reviews.title: Theyre Good
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1. Bluetooth cuts off when cord is in 2. Controls on headphone work well 3. Sounds great 4. Bass is nice 5. Has no lag in bluetooth 6. Battery life is crazy long Cons: 1. Wasnt as loud as i wanted it to be 2. Breakable
customer_reviews.author: These

customer_reviews.title: Look great with some minor flaws.
customer_reviews.text: The sounds is pretty good and they look great. The main problem I've found is they're not very loud when using them through bluetooth. That being said these are my first pair or bluetooth headphones and i've heard that they're all this way. All in all not a bad deal for $235.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: ... when received so didn't get the chance to truly enjoy it.
customer_reviews.text: Was malfunction when received so didn't get the chance to truly enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: JIm

customer_reviews.title: I think this is a great pair of headphones minus the clanky sound
customer_reviews.text: I received my headphones on time. However, when I received my headphones I started using them and I noticed a weird clanky sound when I was walking. I started looking to see what it was and was the cable port where you plug in your able into the headphones. I don't know if it was from previous users wear and tear or what, but that's why I rated four out of five. The sound quality however is exceptional as I would expect with Sony. Overall, I think this is a great pair of headphones minus the clanky sound.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Best over-ear headphones!!!!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I got the headphones I put them on and OMG! They are soooo awesome. Great bass and highs. looks great in package and carry bag is thicker than I would have thought. price is a little high for mostly plastic but for the sound quality its definitely worth it. I did not pay the 400$ but got them directly from japan by BuyJapan through amazon and I got them in 5 days and package looked in one piece. would definitely buy if looking for good quality headphones and are willing to spend the extra few bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina & Billy

customer_reviews.title: Better than anything else.
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth pair of luxury headphones and nothing comes close to the sound quality produced by these phones. The only thing i listen to with comperable sound is my sony home theater ststem with over 100 inches of speakers. Do yourself a favour and bye these. Everything emse will sound terrible after.
customer_reviews.author: Bonals

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Music - Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: I am going to keep this short and sweet...I am EXTREMELY picky about my music and these headphones NAILED what I was looking for. Comfort and incredible sound. I returned the Beats Studio and Sennheiser PXC 450 NoiseGard Active Noise-Canceling Headphones and kept these. These melt onto your head and you don't even notice they are on and the sound you can feel in your bones. GREAT headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffgk1

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bluetooth headset
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed, sound quality is super clear, what I love if the NFC capability, it's one of the reasons I bought it. Bass could be better but it doesn't take away how great this headsets are. All my friends love it. They are comfortable, looks great, and good battery life. Comes with a bag too which I found to be very useful. Good job Sony!!!
customer_reviews.author: C.M

customer_reviews.title: Nice packaging and nice looks
customer_reviews.text: Nice packaging and nice looks! Indistinguishable from a totally new one. Seems to worth more than its value! Real nice! Would definitely recommend to a friend to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Fengnian Zhao

customer_reviews.title: This is an exceptionally nice bluetooth headset and is a good choice if your ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an exceptionally nice bluetooth headset and is a good choice if your application is just listening to music - hence my rating. Bluetooth, however, is not a good choice for musicians who need to listen to and practice with instruments in real-time in a home-studio setting with a computer because the audio encoding process appears to introduce an inherent and unacceptable delay.
customer_reviews.author: DPB

customer_reviews.title: Great for listening to music as well as editing!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are one of the best I've ever owned! The audio quality is sublime and they're lightweight to boot!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: pretty bad delay in the bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are comfortable and sound when playing is great. My major issue with them is the delay in skipping songs or even when a song ends on its own and transitions in to the next song, there is a delay, with the next song being picked 4 or 5 seconds in to the song, sometimes longer. I had purchased a set of the Klipsh Image One wireless bluetooth and they do not have this problem, but are not as "nice" as the Sony models. I do not know if this common, I am attempting to contact Sony to find out....
customer_reviews.author: Julia Koenig

customer_reviews.title: ... headphones for over 3 years and they still perform fantastic. The leather has not cracked and all the ...
customer_reviews.text: I've now owned these headphones for over 3 years and they still perform fantastic. The leather has not cracked and all the joints still feel tight. The sound quality is phenomenal and the fit is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent head phone
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my son and for $187 you can beat the quality and sound of this headphone. The shipping was quick and the product was perfect. Highly recommend these at $200 but $300 there are other options.
customer_reviews.author: frankO

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I am using over 2 weeks now and I really like it. I have apple computer 2008 late my pro, iPad and iPhone 5s. Easy to connect, connection is stable, sound quality is great, and microfron is really clear. Buttery life very good. Very confofrtable but it can be really hot.
customer_reviews.author: Feher

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, expensive, not as loud as beats by dre
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality, they're a tad bit expensive but I like them. My only issue is they don't get as loud as I would've hoped for the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Clutch Conway

customer_reviews.title: This is the headphone that you may want to get!
customer_reviews.text: LOOKS PRETTY COOL! IT IS SO COMFORTABLE WHILE YOU ARE WEARING THIS! GOOD DESIGN! GREAT SOUND QUALITY: Deep bass without muddy feeling. Clear high frequency. Bluetooth connection is very consistent and NFC functions well. Although I just got this headphone for 24 hours, it really surprised me with that good quality. 5 stars represent my feeling and I highly recommend this headphone
customer_reviews.author: Yueyang Huang

customer_reviews.title: Happy I purchased these.
customer_reviews.text: Comfort, NC and the BT convenience was my priority. These phones met all my expectations. They are not NC, but set at medium volume does very well at blocking out loud noise around me. Even at low volume sounds are tolerable. The sound quality could be richer, but wasn't a priority. I can wear these all day in comfort. I would recommend these to a friend. I use my BOSE when I want sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: David Welton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Unit
customer_reviews.text: I researched as usual before I purchased these headphones. I have had different headphones since the 60s and these rank in the top ten as far as sound quality for the price range. Clean bass an mid tones. The treble is right there too. Sony is putting out fine products at a very good price. I bought a Sony bass dock for my IPod Classic and am impressed with the quality of the product. I recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Fink

customer_reviews.title: Very good choice
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, excellent material, rigid design so you don't fear it will break. Sound quality is very good, bass is a bit not natural but suitable for EDM music genre. Excellent value for price, the closest competitor in same price range is Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Friend

customer_reviews.title: Great mid-level headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great mid-level headphones. I've never had any trouble with them and am happy with them over all for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Savanah

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Pretty Comfy. Don't block much sound and the wire can cause some distracting noise at times.
customer_reviews.author: Lemeshow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These feel great, look great and sound awesome. Fairly light weight, with excellent separation of mids and highs.
customer_reviews.author: Burnrub

customer_reviews.title: Great True sound & Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are excellent. Sound is great, both treble and bass. Reviews said they were comfortable and they were right, I wore these for 2 hours and didn't even think about how they felt.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Engel

customer_reviews.title: I Love Them
customer_reviews.text: Great sound even using Bluetooth. Very comfortable. The ear cups fit the ears nicely, better than the round cups. I would like it if they cost a little less but after using them they are worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: BigDog TN

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I don't have a reference set to compare to. I will say these are great. Lots of fun. Not like live, but the closest I've heard. I'm streaming from The Current (mpr.org) over iTunes and also various genres via Spotify and I'm hearing things I've never heard before. These are working fine through a wall or two, but go to three and they start cutting out. I have a Sony 64 bit laptop with Windows 8.1 and I had to download the correct BT driver from Sony.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Sony makes another homerun
customer_reviews.text: Just plain simple - these headphones are what you want if you're looking for something stylish, of great quality, and, most importantly, of great music playing capabilities. Of course, the Blutooth capability makes this a home run as being able to move around freely and not be "tied down by a cord" is a win any day.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto

customer_reviews.title: Big bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones for listening to music, and they do not disappoint. The music has such clarity, and deep bass tones. And they are noise-cancelling as well.
customer_reviews.author: VikkiC23

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of cans
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't consider myself an audiophile, but I do appreciate good sounding headphones and speakers. These Sony headphones are the best over ear headphones I've ever owned. I've had them for about a year and a half, and they have not disappointed me. I've treated them with care and they have remained in like new condition. After breaking them in, they sound great. Bass is not too heavy but noticeable, mids and highs sound great as well. I bough these in 2015 looking for a quality pair of premium cans, and these fit the job very well. If you're looking for a quality pair of headphones that won't break the bank, these could be the ones for you.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great Phones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these simply to watch NetFlicks on my phone while playing live poker. The blue tooth was easy to use and worked great. I think the sound is excellent. I own 7 different headphones, so I have some basis of comparison. My most pleasant surprise was being able to receive a phone call when the headset was on. My caller could hear me clearly. While it wouldn't be my first choice to make calls with, the fact that it worked so well was a big plus for me. Only compliant is my ears got warm, but that is the nature of over the ears phones. Other than warmth, they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Flashy

customer_reviews.title: Sony delivers another great product. The batteries last as long as they ...
customer_reviews.text: Sony delivers another great product. The batteries last as long as they say and the sound quality is very good. When working with an equalizer the sound also is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: K. Pomerantz

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!!
customer_reviews.text: I chose these headphones after much consideration and research. I compared them to the Bose and the Beats, the best if you want truely wireless, blue-tooth connectivity......and the ability to make calls without using a dedicated wire. Money well spent! Only gripe and this has nothing to do with Sony or Apple but at this point they will only work with iOS 5 and below......when I got my new iPhone 5 (which was iOS 6) I was unable to connect.....bummer....gave up the iPhone 5 and kept my Sony headphones and reverted back to my iPhone4.
customer_reviews.author: jridina

customer_reviews.title: These do the trick.
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth phone call clarity? Yes. Respectable sound reproduction? Yes. Ease and reliability of connecting and reconnecting to various bluetooth enabled sources? Absolutely. These are not high end headphones for every note and beat from your high-end music system. But they do a very good job all around.
customer_reviews.author: charles auspitz

customer_reviews.title: I love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. Comfiest headphones I've ever used. Sound quality is very very good... I'm an audiophile and I produce quite a lot of music. Let me tell you, these headphones are pretty good for being bluetooth. I own a pair of Audio Technica ATH-M50's and these are very close in terms of sound quality. Just a tad bit bass heavy, but very good nonetheless. The only con i could think of is that it does get a bit sweaty after using it for a few hours (but then again, I sweat more than most people) The best part about these headphones? NO CORDS STRANGLING YOU!!!! Very very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Danny K

customer_reviews.title: Incredible sound!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones that I ever had by far!!! it's a explosion of sound in your ears, they really sound awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: This product is top of the line quality in all respects - comfort, sound quality, battery life. For those interested in the same bluetooth functionality but cheaper and a little less comfortable (on the ears and hard plastic band over head), Sony DR-BTN200 works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: MARC BEUCHAT

customer_reviews.title: Superior sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Superior to "beats" in every way. Better, clearer highs, mid, and bass. You can read better worded reviews I'm sure, but the bottom line is they are better, cost less, better material also. Not $300 plastic ones.
customer_reviews.author: Harold W. Motte

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great once u pair Bluetooth hard to start out in beginning
customer_reviews.author: EAsian

customer_reviews.title: These head phones are great there extra soft
customer_reviews.text: These head phones are great there extra soft ,load durable ,works Realy good the only thing they could use a little more bass but over all I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: sal esposito

customer_reviews.title: Sony mdr1r bt headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful headphones, extremely light and comfortable, amazingly clear powerful big sound and I love the way you can control the play, rewind, fast forward, pause and repeat track with so much accuracy from the headset with out the need to handle your phone or device, my home is roughly 3000 square foot and I don't loose any connections anywhere, best b.t headphones on the market.
customer_reviews.author: lo lo

customer_reviews.title: Very good headphones. Much less expensive than Bose or Beats
customer_reviews.text: Very good headphones. Much less expensive than Bose or Beats, but does not sacrifice quality. However, I wish it came with a hard case and was a little bit more portable.
customer_reviews.author: Elliot

customer_reviews.title: good pair though
customer_reviews.text: wish they had a little more bass, good pair though.
customer_reviews.author: J. Barcenas

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound and Bluetooth works pretty well with my iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Good Sound and Bluetooth works pretty well with my iPhone. What I like the most about this headphone is that I can still use this headphone even after the battery is dead when I use a cable.
customer_reviews.author: Takashi Tani

customer_reviews.title: Sony MDR 1R headphones.
customer_reviews.text: I chose these over Beats and other manufacturers due to the ratings I read about them. I listen to all genres of music and they are awesome for the price range.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J Brinkman

customer_reviews.title: Terrific headohones, especially when combined with amp.
customer_reviews.text: You don't know what you are missing until you try these. I have Bose Quietcomfort 15 sound reducing headphones and you miss a lot compared with these Sony. Bose definitely reduces outside sound but you miss so much of the highs and lows.even with the amp.
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are amazing and we'll worth the price. I use them all the time, at work, waiting for class to start, or while watching a movie or listening to music. Extremely comfortable and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones
customer_reviews.text: Overall these headphones are great, in sound and comfort. If you enjoy bass then these are ideal for you. These are also some sleekest looking headphones around. The one bugaboo though is the price, which isn't that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Dill Pickle

customer_reviews.title: Good pick
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, fits well, my only complaint is they are very warm in the summer months.
customer_reviews.author: JGG

customer_reviews.title: I really like it
customer_reviews.text: it is a bit more expensive than i would have liked but i would buy it again although next time i would go for either the noise canceling or the bluetooth version pros: sounds good looks nice (not beats lol) keeps ears warm in the cold cons: expensive terrible noise cancellation (i know this is just the base model but my cheap in ears cancel much better) gets scratched easily wants: the pads are comfy but i want comfier i want color choices like maybe blue instead of red
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: 1rbt's
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful headphones. Bluetooth was easy to connect and they work perfectly. They are extremely comfortable. Would recommend even though quite expensive.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: sound is nice, but the overall feel is still a little ...
customer_reviews.text: sound is nice, but the overall feel is still a little on the cheap side. cups are comfortable. i've had them for about 8 months now. still no signs of wear and tear. an overall meh.
customer_reviews.author: CaptainCutler

customer_reviews.title: Finally found what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I tried 6 different higher end portable headphones including the Vmoda 100's and the sennheiser Momentems. Like the others, I could not find the perfect fit for me. The sound or the fit was just not what I wanted, and I wanted to be able to work, listen to music and take phone calls. The Sony MDR1RBT does it all. The sound is as good as any the others I tried, and even better than most. They are very comfortable and I am no longer tied to a cable. This is the perfect combination that worked best for me.
customer_reviews.author: stickersteve

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound, some charging problems
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound, some charging problems. They don't charge when plugged in and you can't charge them while listening which leaves you having to remember to recharge them, when you are not using them.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Faulhaber

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphones I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Love these, comfortable and battery last forever. Only wish is they could go just a bit louder for when I want to rock but they are probably saving me from hearing loss.
customer_reviews.author: eklarsen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is okay, comfort is okay, but nothing special in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: ThreepE0

customer_reviews.title: Its the most comfortable headphone i ever had!!! sound quilty its so good!
customer_reviews.text: Its the most comfortable headphone i ever had!!! sound its so good!
customer_reviews.author: XxNightfuryxX

customer_reviews.title: One of few Sony's good product
customer_reviews.text: sounds very good when power on. will need an headphone amp when useing 3.5mm cable.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth every dime!
customer_reviews.text: In my quest for a great bluetooth headphone, I had been watching these for over a year. When I saw that Amazon showed these as being discontinued (new, lower priced unit being introduced), I pulled the trigger and couldn't be happier. Set up was a breeze. The controls are well located and easily accessible and they are, as reported, very comfortable. The sound quality is amazing with very balanced bass and highs. Absolutely worth the investment. If you're considering these, buy them before they're gone!
customer_reviews.author: TBurnz

customer_reviews.title: Very well said
customer_reviews.text: Everything is within my expectation. From the committed schedule up to the quality of this product are very well said and superb! Thanks! Keep up the good customer satisfaction. Looking forward for more shopping in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Also the sound was not that good, more mechanical than the MDR10R
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. I purchased these and the MDR10R. The MDR1R were noticeably bigger and really loose on my head. I do have a smaller head, but I put them on the lowest setting and they were still moving around. I couldn't move my head without them adjusting. Also the sound was not that good, more mechanical than the MDR10R. Plus they're both made out of plastic so I returned them, just couldn't see spending that much on plastic. In the end, I got the V-Moda M100s.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the headphones is really nice and comfort
customer_reviews.text: In general, the headphones is really nice and comfort, the only problem I've found is microphone working on windy / noisy environment - looks like it doesn't have noise cancellation, so remote side hear all the environment's sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Roman Ovchinnikov

customer_reviews.title: It does not function properly with the iPhone, only ...
customer_reviews.text: It does not function properly with the iPhone, only the MK II version!
customer_reviews.author: Jefferson Soares

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphone I have Owned
customer_reviews.text: I love the Sony MDR-1RBT Premium Bluetooth Headphones. I chose them first because of their eligent style and second because of the quality of these headphones. They look great and sound great! What more can I ask for in headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Perry D

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase- Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these Sony headphones great sound and blocks out any noise.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Ahlquist

customer_reviews.title: like the v-moda 100 and the wired version of this ...
customer_reviews.text: I had tried others, like the v-moda 100 and the wired version of this (mdr1r). I enjoy the mdr1rbt more than the others. I love it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good Bluetooth head phone, the sound is very clear

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I've owned. I've used these 5 days a week for year at work and they're still good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones. They sound great and they work great for watching tv/movies. I use them for listening to my tv via bluetooth. They are the most comfortable headphones i have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: stewbeme

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: stable connection unlike many headphone surround sound is good but lack of noise isolation/cancelling. Good for outdoor walk but not loud transportation. The overall is good.
customer_reviews.author: chutchatut

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones just some build quality issues
customer_reviews.text: Sound Quality is excellent, I just wish the synthetic leather was better. The told band of leather is already turning white after only a month of very moderate/light usage.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: They have a very good sound quality. They have good bass, but it isn't ridiculously boosted to where its the predominant feature of the song. I would definitely recommend these to anyone wanting a high quality pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Good choice over beats!
customer_reviews.text: These sound amazing, for BT headphones I'm very happy with their performance.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Lukenda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Everything I wanted and expected from this. I got for 256$ I waited for it to go down from 300ish, I know others have got it for 200$ but I didn't want to wait forever.
customer_reviews.author: DamnedNForsaken

customer_reviews.title: Best I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: After 40 years I have finally found a pair go headphones that I love. I've tried more brands and models than I can remember. These just sound great, and they feel great too. Very comfy. I don't wear mine out in public, so I'm not worried about outside noise, so I can't comment on that. As far as studio headphones go, these are excellent value for the $.
customer_reviews.author: McGilli

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound, love the convenience of wireless. However, it is not automatic when i use it from iphone to ipad, requires disconnecting and reconnecting bluetooth from device to device. Battery life is good.
customer_reviews.author: Edmund P. Papa

product_meta.title: Sony MDR1RBT Premium Bluetooth Over-the-Head Style Headphones (Black)
product_meta.description: Style:other| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingCountless details combined to deliver: precision sound quality, thoughtful design, and long-term comfort. Available in three models, including Bluetooth and Digital Noise Canceling capable models, Sony MDR-1R headphones offer premium style with performance for a headphone experience without equal.
feature_bullets: Listen wirelessly to compatible Bluetooth audio devices.
NFC easy connect for quick and simple Bluetooth pairing with a tap
Enfolding structure delivers wrap around comfort and an improved acoustic seal for improved bass response
Comfortable ear pads deliver powerful bass response and long-term comfort
